statements: SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT sensor_id, energy_reading FROM EnergyConsumptionData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(energy_reading) FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, energy_reading FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT MAX(energy_reading) AS max_energy FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, energy_reading FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_reading > 100 ORDER BY energy_reading ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, energy_reading FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(energy_reading) AS max_energy_reading FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING MAX(energy_reading) > 500;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_readings FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 ORDER BY total_readings DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, energy_reading FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_id, energy_reading, timestamp FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_reading > 100;
SELECT * FROM SensorDetails WHERE location = 'Laboratory A';
SELECT sensor_model, installation_date FROM SensorDetails WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT sensor_id, energy_reading FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_id, energy_reading, timestamp FROM EnergyConsumptionData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM SensorDetails WHERE location LIKE 'Kitchen%';
SELECT installation_date, sensor_model FROM SensorDetails WHERE sensor_model = 'Model X' ORDER BY installation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData INNER JOIN SensorDetails ON EnergyConsumptionData.sensor_id = SensorDetails.sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_consumed > 100;
SELECT sensor_id, location_name, city, country FROM SensorLocation WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT sensor_id, status FROM SensorStatus ORDER BY last_reported DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, location_name, city FROM SensorLocation WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, status, last_reported FROM SensorStatus WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY last_reported DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT sensor_id, location_name, city, country FROM SensorLocation WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT sensor_id, location_name FROM SensorLocation ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, installation_date FROM SensorMetadata WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT MAX(energy_usage) AS max_energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT sensor_id, status FROM SensorStatus WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM SensorLocation WHERE location_name LIKE 'Living Room%' ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT SensorLocation.location_name, SensorStatus.status FROM SensorLocation INNER JOIN SensorStatus ON SensorLocation.sensor_id = SensorStatus.sensor_id WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT SensorMetadata.sensor_type, COUNT(*) AS Total_Sensors FROM SensorMetadata GROUP BY sensor_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY Total_Sensors DESC;

SELECT SensorMetadata.sensor_id, SensorLocation.location_name, SensorMetadata.sensor_type, SensorMetadata.installation_date FROM SensorMetadata LEFT JOIN SensorLocation ON SensorMetadata.sensor_id = SensorLocation.sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM SensorLocation;
SELECT sensor_id, location_name FROM SensorLocation ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, location_name FROM SensorLocation WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_id, location_name FROM SensorLocation WHERE location_name = 'Office';
SELECT location_name, sensor_id FROM SensorLocation;
SELECT * FROM SensorLocation;
SELECT sensor_id, location_name FROM SensorLocation ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS num_entries FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT s.sensor_id, s.location_name, d.timestamp, d.energy_consumption FROM SensorLocation s INNER JOIN SensorData d ON s.sensor_id = d.sensor_id WHERE d.energy_consumption > 100;
SELECT a.alert_id, a.sensor_id, a.alert_type, m.maintenance_type FROM SensorAlert a LEFT JOIN SensorMaintenance m ON a.sensor_id = m.sensor_id;
